oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cianciolo Theaters
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: theaters; movies; film; buildings;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "The Cianciolo theatres are shown together here as part of an ad in 1995 announcing the construction of a new theatre in Whitehaven Plaza. That theatre was never completed, but a Whitehaven Cinema was constructed in 1966 by General Cinema and was twinned in 1973. Instead of a new theatre in Whitehaven, the southernmost suburb, a theatre was opened in Frayser, the northernmost suburb." - Caption from Vincent Astor's book, Memphis Movie Theatres.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Memphis Press Scimitar, 75th anniversary edition, 976.89 M54a
